FORBID_PLAYER_DATA_ERROR.msg: Modifying the game itself using unity tools from github.

FORBID_CHEATING_PLUGINS.msg: The most common ban reason which player can get. (Using external programs or cheats while playing in the game.)

FORBID_ABNORMAL_BEHAVIOR.msg: The anticheat caught you doing something suspicious in the game like disabling it or using any exploits to prevent it from malfunc.
